title: Top 10 Fantasy MVP Picks for 2021 - Fantasy Football Podcast for 9/1
description:
September is here and The Fantasy Footballers are back with a special episode! On today’s fantasy football podcast, we’re bringing on a number of fantasy experts and friends to deliver 2021 Fantasy MVP picks! Find out which players will be fantasy football league winners! Plus, the latest NFL roster cut news and a new edition of Buy or Sell. Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for September 1st, 2021.
  
 Dominate your fantasy football draft with the 2021 Ultimate Draft Kit -- get the Draft Analyzer with the UDK+
  
 (06:00) - Buy or Sell
 (11:05) - NFL News
 (22:20) - Fantasy MVP
 (23:20) - Liz Loza / Austin Ekeler
 (26:20) - Jamey Eisenberg / Myles Gaskin
 (30:45) - Marcas Grant / Antonio Gibson
 (33:20) - Adam Lefkoe / Gus Edwards
 (37:35) - Adam Rank / Trey Lance
 (39:45) - Danny Kelly / Matthew Stafford
 (44:10) - Kyle Borgognoni / George Kittle
 (47:00) - Mike Wright / Najee Harris
 (49:45) - Andy Holloway / Raheem Mostert
 (53:45) - Jason Moore / Terry McLaurin
  
 Connect with the show:
  Subscribe on YouTube
 Visit us on the Web
 Support the Show
 Follow on Twitter
 Follow on Instagram
  
 Join THE largest fantasy football league! Megalabowl.com
  
 Check out today's sponsors:
  
 Manscaped -- Code: FOOTBALLERS20

 Indochino -- Code: FOOTBALLERS
